Changes
=======

Version 1.0.2 (2022-11-25)

- Add i18n translations.

Version 1.0.1 (2022-11-15)

- Compute file status based on storage class.
- Use bulk indexing on when rebuilding indices.

Version 1.0.0

- Initial public release.
